Entity\Profile
--------------

```php
# constructor
__construct($address = null, $login = null, $password = null, $port = 22)

# address
setAddress($address) : Profile
getAddress() : string

# login
setLogin($login) : Profile
getLogin() : string

# password
setPassword($password) : Profile
getPassword() : string

# port
setPort($port) : Profile
getPort() : int
```

See [Entity\Connection](connection.md)
